title: Being a New Parent is Hard | Compilation

media:group.media:title: Being a New Parent is Hard | Compilation
media:group.media:description:
The first 1,000 people to use the link will get a 1 month free trial of Skillshare:  https://skl.sh/scishowpsych06221 

From the baby blues to helping your toddler through a temper tantrum, many things can make being a new parent a hard time for you and your child, but a bit of science can help us navigate this period of life.

Hosted by: Hank Green
